parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The valve cover leak can cause oil to spill on the road, creating a slippery surface that can lead to accidents, and potentially cause engine failure if not addressed.
symptoms: Oil leak on the left side of the engine
oil dripping from the valve cover area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the camshaft and tappets can cause the engine to lock up, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: excessive noise from the cam area

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain can cause the engine to malfunction, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents or injuries.

The premature failure of the camshaft and tappets can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs, and potentially resulting in engine seizure or failure, which can cause accidents or leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: engine warning lights or error codes.
